short_description: This function is used to take any document set and compute the Term Frequency (TF), Inverse Document Frequency (IDF), and Term Frequency * Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF) scores for each term.
long_description: This function is used to take any document set and compute the Term Frequency (TF), Inverse Document Frequency (IDF), and Term Frequency * Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF) scores for each term.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The table that contains the document id and the term.
input_tables.description: The table that contains the document id and the term.

argument_clauses.name: DocIdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the document identifier.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the document identifier.

argument_clauses.name: TokenColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the tokens.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the tokens.

argument_clauses.name: TFNormalization
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the normalization method for calculating the term frequency (TF). Default: 'NORMAL'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the normalization method for calculating the term frequency (TF). Default: 'NORMAL'.

argument_clauses.name: IDFNormalization
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the normalization method for calculating the inverse document frequency (IDF). Default: 'LOG'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the normalization method for calculating the inverse document frequency (IDF). Default: 'LOG'.

argument_clauses.name: Regularization
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the regularization method for calculating the TF-IDF score. Default: 'NONE'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the regularization method for calculating the TF-IDF score. Default: 'NONE'.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input table columns to copy to the output table.
